content: 7 k2 kfb k3 kfb k2 11 sts conker nut row 8 to 11 starting on a ws purl row work 4 make 1 per conker cast on 10 sts using 3 25mm row in st st single pointed needles and chocolate brown yarn start at the bottom row 12 p2tog 5 times p1 6 sts row 1 to 2 starting on a rs knit row work 2 row pull through to cast off in st st row 3 rs k1 kfb 8 times k1 18 sts bunny s rabbit hole row 4 ws purl make 1 per bunny cast on 37 sts using 3 25mm row 5 k1 kfb k1 8 times k1 26 sts single pointed needles and woody brown yarn start at the outer edge row 6 to 9 starting on a ws purl row work 4 row in st st row 1 to 5 knit break the chocolate brown yarn and join palest row 6 k1 k2tog k2 9 times 28 sts pink row 7 knit row 10 p1 p2tog p1 8 times p1 18 sts row 8 k1 k2tog k1 9 times 19 sts row 11 knit row 9 knit row 12 p2tog 9 times 9 sts row 10 k1 k2tog 9 times 10 sts pull through to cast off pull through to cast off conker shell making up for the hole sew side edges decrease to make 1 per conker shell cast make a circle and weave in tails on ws for the on 11 sts using 3 25mm single body sew side edges decrease stuff and sew cast on pointed needles and mid edge onto the hole slightly off-centre sew a white green yarn start at the bottom fleece pompom on top of the body for the tail for each foot sew side edges decrease stuffing lightly as you row 1 to 2 starting on a rs knit row sew and gather cast on sts decrease with seam facing work 2 row in st st the body sew the cast on end of each foot onto the row 3 rs k1 kfb 9 times k1 20 sts body on either side of the tail row 4 and all foll ws row purl autumn warmth wreath copyright © 2024 amanda berry page 7 of 19 row 5 k1 kfb mb kfb k1 4 times kfb mb k1 hedgehog 29 sts row 7 k1 mb k3 7 times hedgehog body row 9 k3 mb 7 times k1 make 1 per hedgehog row 11 k1 k2tog k1 k2tog mb 4 times k2tog cast on 9 sts using 3 25mm k2 20 sts single pointed needles and woody brown yarn start at the bottom end row 13 k2tog 10 times 10 sts row 1 to 2 knit pull through to cast off row 3 rs kfb 8 times k1 17 sts row 4 knit making up for each conker nut sew the side edges decrease stuffing as you sew and gather the cast row 5 k1 kfb
